title: Claudia Teases Big Change in The Traitors Show
summary: Claudia Winkleman, the host of a TV show called The Traitors, has shared exciting news about a new twist in the upcoming series. In a trailer, fans saw someone wearing a red cloak, which is different from the usual green cloaks worn by the traitors. Claudia says there are "truly extraordinary" moments that made her gasp, but she won't tell us what the twist is until the show starts on New Year's Day. The show has contestants who are either traitors or faithfuls, and they play a game of secrets and lies. Fans are guessing that the red cloak might mean a new role for a contestant. Claudia promises that this series will be full of surprises and heated arguments between players.

background_read: The Traitors is a popular TV game show where contestants are divided into traitors and faithfuls. Traitors secretly try to eliminate faithfuls, while faithfuls try to identify and vote out the traitors. The show involves strategy, lies, and teamwork, and it has become a hit with audiences. In past series, traitors wore green cloaks, but a new trailer shows a red cloak, hinting at changes. The show is hosted by Claudia Winkleman and produced by Studio Lambert. It started with regular seasons and recently had a celebrity version that was very successful.
